I think we should head there tomorrow,
and then head out for the coast the following morning.
translation.ja: そして翌朝 海岸へ

translation.en: you didn't tell the team about your connection to Kane, I wasn't sure if that was a good idea.
translation.ja: 皆に伝えるべきだと 思ってたけど

translation.en: yeah. I'm not sure how they would have reacted to you.
translation.ja: 確かに 黙っていて 正解だったのかも

translation.en: Why did my husband volunteer for a suicide mission?
translation.ja: 夫はなぜ 自殺行為を？

translation.en: Is that what you think we're doing?

translation.ja: 自殺行為だと？ 審査したんでしょう？

translation.en: So you're asking me as a psychologist.
I'd say you're confusing suicide with self-destruction.
translation.ja: 自殺と 自己破壊は 別のものよ

translation.en: Almost none of us commit suicide...
and almost all of us self-destruct.
translation.ja: でも自己破壊は誰でもする

translation.en: In some way, in some part of our lives.

translation.ja: キャリアを傷つけたり
理性的な選択ではなく―

translation.en: In fact, you're probably better equipped to explain this than I am.
translation.ja: 多分... あなたの方が詳しいでしょう
自己破壊は私達の細胞に―

translation.en: Wake up, Josie, come on. Wake up. Something's happening.
translation.ja: 起きて　何か聞こえた

translation.en: [Cassie] What happened? I heard a noise.
-Through the fence? -It's ripped open like a fucking zipper.

translation.ja: どうしたの？ 何てこと

translation.en: Sheppard was next to me. Something took her.
translation.ja: シェパードが襲われた

translation.en: -[Cassie continues screaming] -Oh, fuck! Oh, fuck! Sheppard!
translation.ja: 何てことなの シェパード！

translation.en: -We have to go back now. -[Anya] She's right.
-[sighs] -[Anya] We lost one of our own.
We have evidence the previous team went nuts and chopped each other up.
translation.ja: 前の隊は 狂って殺し合った

translation.en: I really don't know how much more right she has to be.
translation.ja: これ以上 どんな根拠が？

translation.en: We still don't understand the cause or the nature of the Shimmer.
We have data, observations, photographs. She has hella footage.
translation.ja: データはある　ビデオも

translation.en: All of which makes the phenomenon less explicable, not more.
translation.ja: でも 謎は深まっただけよ

translation.en: I'm gonna get to the lighthouse,
and I'm fine going on my own.
You just need to decide... whether you're coming with me or not.
translation.ja: 一緒に来るか来ないか 自分で決めて

translation.en: It's like she hasn't noticed that Sheppard is dead.
You know, and thanks for the fucking backup, Lena.
translation.ja: レナはどっちの味方だ？

translation.en: -I didn't realize there were sides. -[Anya] Yeah.
translation.ja: そういう問題じゃ… いいや

translation.en: Okay, then I agree with you. We should go back.
translation.ja: 私も戻るべきだと思うわ

translation.en: Good. Okay, great. There we go. Okay?
-So the three of us can-- -[Lena] Hold on a minute.
translation.ja: じゃあ行こう　３人で… ちょっと待って

translation.en: But it took us, what, six days to get here?
And the coast is two days away.

translation.ja: シェパードが言った通り

translation.en: when we get to the coast, we can follow it until the perimeter wall.
translation.ja: 海岸に着けば― 反対側に出れる

translation.en: You're saying we get out by going deeper?

translation.ja: どうだか　信用できないね

translation.en: This isn't some bullshit tactic to get us to the lighthouse, is it?
translation.ja: 灯台に連れて行く気だろ

translation.en: This is not about the lighthouse, okay?
I believe that the coast is the best route out.
translation.ja: 早くここから出るためよ

translation.en: I didn't know what going back meant.
translation.ja: 進んでも引き返しても―

translation.en: Why it would be safer than going forward.
translation.ja: 危険は同じだと思った

translation.en: [man] You didn't know, but you made a decision to continue as if you did.
translation.ja: だから進むべきと 判断したと？

translation.en: [man] Ventress had cancer. She was never coming back.
translation.ja: 彼女は がんだった

translation.en: Fine. Just... leave me the fuck alone.
translation.ja: いいから 放っておいて

translation.en: It's another two hours' walk up the coast.
translation.ja: 海岸まで あと２時間よ

translation.en: At first I thought the radio waves were blocked by the Shimmer,
translation.ja: シマーが電波を ブロックしてるから―

translation.en: and that's why no one inside could communicate with base or GPS,
translation.ja: 通信できないのかと 思っていたけど

translation.en: but the light waves aren't blocked, they're refracted, and...
translation.ja: 光はブロックされずに 反射している　そして…

translation.en: know what you'd get if you sequenced it?

translation.ja: 何？ ヒトのＨＯＸ遺伝子が

translation.en: Hox? What is-- What's Hox mean?
They're the genes that define the body plan, the physical structure.
translation.ja: 体の構造を決定する 遺伝子のことよ

translation.en: And the plants have human body plan.
Arms attached to shoulders. Legs to hips.
translation.ja: 肩に腕が２本ついてて― 腰から脚が

translation.en: The Shimmer is a prism, but it refracts everything.
translation.ja: シマーは 全てを反射するプリズム

translation.en: Not just light and radio waves.
translation.ja: 光や電波だけじゃない
動物や植物 全てのＤＮＡを―

translation.en: All right... I guess this is a bedroom.
You spend more time away from your husband than with him.
translation.ja: ケインは 任務で ほとんど不在だ

translation.en: You can't talk to him about work, and he won't talk to you about his.
translation.ja: 夫婦の間で 仕事の話もできない

translation.en: And there is a clear physical and intellectual connection between us.
translation.ja: 私達の間には明らかに つながりがある

translation.en: -Have I covered the bases? -You forgot your wife.
You think that something may have happened to him?
You think somehow he's found out about our affair.
I'm not interested in talking... or in anything you have to say.
translation.ja: 何も話したくないし 聞きたくない

translation.en: Just get dressed and get out.
You know, it's not me you hate, it's yourself.
translation.ja: 君が憎んでるのは 君自身だ

translation.en: You don't get to ask that fucking question. You answer it!
-[Anya] Why didn't you tell us? -[speaks indistinctly]

translation.ja: あんたは― 知ってたよな

translation.en: There are two theories of what went wrong.
One is that something in here killed them.
translation.ja: 誰かに殺された あるいは...

translation.en: Two... is that they went crazy and they killed each other.
translation.ja: 誰かに殺された あるいは... 仲間同士で殺し合った

translation.en: Josie nearly got killed by an alligator,
translation.ja: ラデックはワニに襲われ

translation.en: and Cass did get killed by a bear. [voice breaks]
translation.ja: シェパードはクマにやられた

translation.en: So, yes, theory one, it fits.
I didn't actually see a bear.
[Anya] The only people who saw were Lena and Ventress.
translation.ja: 見たのは レナとヴェントレスだけ

translation.en: So nothing's confirmed. Everything's on their word.
translation.ja: 証拠はない あの時―
あの場にいた レナの証言だけが根拠だ

translation.en: is that Lena... is a liar.
translation.ja: 私達に嘘をついていた

translation.en: Or do you think I've lost my shit and we're gonna fuck each other up?
translation.ja: それとも狂ったのは私で―

translation.en: When I look at my hands...
and you tie me to a chair and cut me open...
are my insides gonna move like my fingerprints?
translation.ja: 腹を割かれて 内臓が動くのかも

translation.en: But... I'm not the one tied to a chair.
translation.ja: でも 縛られてるのは 私じゃない

translation.en: -You said she was dead. -[Lena speaks indistinctly]

translation.ja: シェパード！　 今 行くよ！

translation.en: [in Cassie's voice] Help me! Help me!
-It's not even light yet. -I don't have time to wait.
translation.ja: まだ暗いわ 時間がない

translation.en: Our bodies as fast as our minds. Can't you feel it?
It's like the onset of dementia.
If I don't reach the lighthouse soon...
the person that started this journey won't be the person that ends it.
translation.ja: 着く頃には 自分を失ってる

translation.en: I want to be the one that ends it.
How long was your husband in the Shimmer?
translation.ja: 旦那さんは 何日ここに？

translation.en: Theoretically, as long as a year.
That's a long time to be inside and remain intact.
translation.ja: そんなに長い間 無事でいたのね

translation.en: I'm not so sure he was intact.

translation.ja: あなたもそう思う？ ええ

translation.en: I checked my blood last night.
It will be in all of us.
Sheppard's voice in the mouth of that creature last night.
translation.ja: あの生き物から シェパードの声が…

translation.en: I think as she was dying, part of her mind became...
translation.ja: 彼女が死ぬ時 心の一部が―

translation.en: part of the creature that was killing her.
translation.ja: あいつの一部になったのね

translation.en: Imagine dying frightened and in pain,
translation.ja: 恐怖と痛みの中で死んで―

translation.en: and having that as the only part of you which survives.
translation.ja: その感覚だけが この世に残る

translation.en: I wouldn't like that at all.
Ventress wants to face it. You want to fight it.
translation.ja: ヴェントレスは真実を あなたは戦いを求めてる

translation.en: But I don't think I want either of those things.
translation.ja: でも私は どちらもいらない

translation.en: One by one, all gone, except you.
translation.ja: 君を残し 次々と人が消えていった

translation.en: Is it something I need to explain?
I'm not sure any of them did.
♪ You'll see something certain To tell you ♪
I thought I was a man.
And now I'm not so sure.
If I wasn't Kane, what was I?
You ever seen a phosphorus grenade go off? They're kind of bright.
translation.ja: 白リン弾の爆発は― 眩しい

translation.en: If you ever get out of here, you find Lena.
translation.ja: ここを出たら レナを探せ
ドクター･ヴェントレス？

translation.en: That I needed to know what was inside the lighthouse.
translation.ja: 灯台の中に 何があるか 知りたいと
それは 私の中にある

translation.en: I don't know what it wants.
will be fragmented into their smallest parts until...
translation.ja: その一部になる 全てが飲み込まれる

translation.en: I don't think it wanted anything.
translation.ja: 目的は たぶんない
でも 君を攻撃した

translation.en: I'm not sure it even knew I was there.
It came here for a reason.
translation.ja: でも 目的はあるはずだ

translation.en: It was mutating our environment, it was destroying everything.
translation.ja: 環境を変異させ 破壊したのだから
新しく創り出していた

translation.en: A team reached the lighthouse a few hours ago.
translation.ja: さっき部隊が灯台に着いた

translation.en: If what you encountered was once alive...
translation.ja: 何であれ 君が出会った存在は―

translation.en: Now will you tell me what happened to my husband?
his blood pressure stabilized and his pulse rate started to rise.
translation.ja: 同時に血圧が安定し 脈も正常になって―

translation.en: A few hours later, he was not only awake,
